entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:18 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:18 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023
